name: Love me dearly
description:
Are you ready to be loved?

To be cared for?

To be cherished?

To be watched?

Well, then we have the game for you!

Settle down in a small and cozy town in the middle of nowhere and meet the love of your life:

The kind and gentle Takuma Kiyou.

Our goal is to provide a romance game experience, that you never had before.

So what are you waiting for?

Play today and enjoy being loved.
